title: Flintshire Historical Society Publications
aka: Publications of the Flintshire Historical Society
additional-notes: This is a British publication. Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US.

Some issues of this serial have distinctive titles. Before concluding such issues are in the public domain, search for renewals for books under those titles.  We have not systematically done such searches for this serial.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Kelsey LeClair for copyright research on this title.
